mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drs_documentary (documentary_name, detail_url, play_count, documentary_type, release_year, total_episodes, rating, like_count, director, description, broadcast_time) VALUES (#{documentaryName}, #{detailUrl}, #{playCount}, #{documentaryType}, #{releaseYear}, #{totalEpisodes}, #{rating}, #{likeCount}, #{director}, #{description}, #{broadcastTime})
